TunableList.name: BUSINESS_TYPE_TO_BUSINESS_DATA_MAP
TunableList.display: Business Type To Business Data Map
TunableList.description: A mapping of business types to the business tuning for that type.

Tunable.name: Business Tuning
Tunable.description: A reference to the Business tuning that corresponds to the tuned Business Type.

TunableEnum.name: Business Type
TunableEnum.description: The business type to map to reference to business tuning.

TunableEnum.name: LEGACY_RETAIL_ADDITIONAL_SLOT_EMPLOYEE_TYPE
TunableEnum.display: Legacy Retail Additional Slot Employee Type
TunableEnum.description: Set the default employee type that gain the additional employee slot when loading legacy retail saves.
